channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: In weird IT problems of the day‚Ä¶ I haven‚Äôt been able to log into https://t.co/B3mk2nW39s for several days. On a lark I tried over a VPN, and it worked. Without the VPN I‚Äôm blocked from their sign-in server. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è https://t.co/Wk081KZSLD

item.description: @tehnyit Like the fax my wife got from a Spanish lawyer saying her Australian cousin died without heirs and she could get the inheritance. Very legit.
item.source:markdown: @tehnyit Like the fax my wife got from a Spanish lawyer saying her Australian cousin died without heirs and she could get the inheritance. Very legit.

item.description: @tessaapproves I just looked at both the German and US Top 40, I recognized at most 5 songs on each. I was a college radio DJ, I used to keep close track of the charts!
item.source:markdown: @tessaapproves I just looked at both the German and US Top 40, I recognized at most 5 songs on each. I was a college radio DJ, I used to keep close track of the charts!

item.description: Our business accountant finished up 2021 earlier than usual, so I can send my numbers to my US tax preparer now instead of late September. No US tax again this year, just a fee for the preparer. üòÉ
item.source:markdown: Our business accountant finished up 2021 earlier than usual, so I can send my numbers to my US tax preparer now instead of late September. No US tax again this year, just a fee for the preparer. üòÉ

item.description: @MCinHD This batch sat for a day and a half. üòÉ We wanted to try it a couple of times before investing in equipment. Need a mason jar and a proper grinder.

item.description: Cold brew attempt number 2. First time I tried to put 1 liter of water in the 1 liter French press, which leaves no room for grounds! This time was 840 ml water to 160 g coffee, producing 500 ml concentrate, dilute 1:1 to drink. https://t.co/T6eJ5Um9Fh
item.source:markdown: Cold brew attempt number 2. First time I tried to put 1 liter of water in the 1 liter French press, which leaves no room for grounds! This time was 840 ml water to 160 g coffee, producing 500 ml concentrate, dilute 1:1 to drink. https://t.co/T6eJ5Um9Fh

item.description: @NuwOne All one flight, and no rest room on board either. üòÉ He‚Äôs getting better with experience and training, as well as knowing the weather and planning the night before.

item.description:
Our son called to say he‚Äôd be coming home late tonight‚Ä¶ understandable since he flew a glider nearly 10 hours and over 900 km today.

Triangle to Poland, Dessau, and back. New personal bests for time and distance. https://t.co/EXlFj6AgN8
